channel.title: Server Keeps Crashing need help fast!
channel.description:
Ok here is the error that suddenly just happens and my server crashes, says everyone is already online, could it be something wrong i added? Even though my compiler says everything is fine.
:
http://img444.imageshack.us/i/error2h.png/

item.title: Server Keeps Crashing need help fast!
item.dc:creator: @DemonsworldOwner DemonsworldOwner
item.description:
@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

Its something you did wrong, i get that sometimes, its a code that works and is fine with the complier, but the server rejects it, and it can be all cus of 1 tiny thing like, say i added drops to 100+ monsters with 1000 total drops, and i make 1 id to long, itll do that, like for me mine doesnt let me add drops with the ids of over 15000+ get to know your server better, expriment with it to see ur limlits.

Read full topic
item.source: Server Keeps Crashing need help fast!

item.title: Server Keeps Crashing need help fast!
item.dc:creator: @lary370 lary370
item.description:
@lary370 wrote:

Check your:
server.java
playerHandler.java
client.java
The error lies somewhere in those files.
I recommend you to delete all the .class files fix error and compile.

Read full topic
item.source: Server Keeps Crashing need help fast!
